frameset.edef: Joining, entering in, becoming a member in

(NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حزب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المؤتمر) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطني))))))) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يؤكد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC انضمام) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN_PROP محمد) (NOUN_PROP سر) (NOUN_PROP الختم) (DET+NOUN_PROP الميرغني)) (PUNC ,) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ابن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN عم) (NP (NOUN_PROP محمد) (DET+NOUN_PROP الميرغني))))) (PUNC ,) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN صفوف) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: Mohammed Sirelkhtim Merghani cousin of Mohammed Mirghani

example.arg: محمد سر الختم الميرغني ابن عم محمد الميرغني
